description: Strap In, Plug In, and Power Up!Power Your AC-Equipped Devices In The CarNeed to power a device that doesn't have a USB-charging adapter? No problem! Insert the PowerFlex into your DC outlet and you can use your AC adapters anywhere your car is! The PowerFlex works great for powering Phones, Tablets, Portable DVD Players, Digital Cameras, iPods, MP3 Players, GPS Units, Handheld Gaming Consoles, and much more.Portable, Smart DesignThe PowerFlex design is lightweight and compact, making it a perfect travel companion. It's small enough to fit in your purse, backpack or even your pockets, so you can take it with you anywhere. It also comes outfitted with several safety features, including Overload & Short Circuit Prevention, and an Auto Shutdown Function when your vehicle battery is low. Upgrade your charging capabilities today!WORKS WITH:LaptopsApple Macbook , Pro , Air / Acer / Asus / HP / Lenovo / Toshiba / SamsungMP3 playersSamsung Galaxy Player / Apple iPod / Zune HD / Sony Walkman / Sandisk SansaTabletsGoogle Nexus 7 / Microsoft Surface RT , Pro / Apple iPad / Motorola Xoom , Xyboard / Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 , Tab 2 & 1 , ATIV Smart PC Pro , ATIV Tab / Pandigital / Acer Iconia Tab A100 , A700 / Toshiba Excite , Thrive / Lenovo IdeaPad , ThinkPad / Asus Transformer TF300 , TF101 , Prime / Archos / Coby Kyros / HP TouchPad / Dell StreakSmartphonesNokia Lumia 920 , 820 , 808 PureView / Motorola Droid RAZR HD , MAXX HD , i , M , Photon Q , Atrix HD , Electrify 2 / HTC Droid DNA , One X , S , V , 8X , Rezound , EVO 4G Rhyme / Samsung Galaxy S III , S II , Nexus , Note 2 , ATIV S , Skyrocket , Stratosphere , Brightside/ LG Optimus G , 4X , Xpression , Lucid / iPhone 5 , 4S , 4Gaming ConsolesSony PS Vita , PSP , PSPgo / Nintendo 3DS , DSGPSGarmin , TomTom , MagellanAnd more!
title: ENHANCE Mobile PowerFlex 300W DC Power Inverter & Car Travel Charger w/ USB port + AC Outlet for Laptops, Cellphones , Tablets , MP3 Players , Portable DVD Players , Handheld Gaming Consoles , GPS Units , and more!
